description:
Sameday theatre tickets on the go. Its simple and fast to buy tickets using your HP for a great range of west end musicals and theatre performances. [English only]

You can check out the latest shows available today. you can see the latest ticket availability in real-time and pick the time of show that suits you best.

Once you have picked a show you can read detailed show info and reviews, find the best transport options and see the theatres on your mobile map application.

Just call our UK call centre to choose seats and make payment with a credit card. You can book tickets until the very last-minute before the show, just make sure you can get to the theatre in time!

Once you have paid you will be emailed your reservation and you can pick up your tickets at the theatre box office before the show by giving your name and having the credit card you purchased with as proof of purchase, simple!
